sys_ux_client_script.name: Refresh submitted screen

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_d8cbc97a41613010d920d92c0d7c7561
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">1ccbc97a3361301029e6fb7224be1861</macroponent><name>Refresh submitted screen</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId,
        number
    } = api.context.props;
    if(table !== "sc_request"){
        api.setState("successNumber",number);
        api.setState("successSysId",sysId);
    }else{
        api.setState("requestSysId",sysId);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 07:40:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>d8cbc97a41613010d920d92c0d7c7561</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh submitted screen</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Online Garage" source="x_625304_online_0">c84909f607613010fff7f7fc7c1ed00b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Online Garage">c84909f607613010fff7f7fc7c1ed00b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d8cbc97a41613010d920d92c0d7c7561</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 07:40:27</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
